name: Because Potatoes - GMTKJam 2018
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2018 Submission by Tom Goldthwait (@Authw8) and Nick Uroseva (@Nick_Uroseva).

Because Potatoes - You're a potato. Earn points for collecting chips and get the highest score before you die in an endless potato factory.

CONTROLS:
CTRL/L CLICK - drop spring (jump)
ALT/R CLICK - slow drop spring (jump)
L SHIFT - restart

All graphics were created during the Jam by Nick Uroseva.

Music: "Dank Memes" by: TimBeek.com

Source code: https://github.com/Authweight/GMTKGameJam2018
